body: It's human nature to worship people with a high social status. Dream was planted by YouTube to generate long videos with lots of space for ads, so of course they shill him all over everyone's suggestions so everyone will watch the videos they optimized for monetization. As a side effect he gets insanely popular very quickly. Many of these people are also girls and gay guys who want to bang him.
